MonitoredObjectsCriteria.description: Monitored objects are specified by the MonitoredObjectsCriteria.

monitoredObjectInstances.description: A list of object identifiers for specifying what monitored objects need to be referencenced

monitoredObjectClass.description: A monitored object class for specifying the set of instances that are referenced

monitoredObjectFilter.description: A filter that can be used in conjunction with the monitored object class for specifying the set of instances that are referenced
